description: Dalit Bandhu is a flagship scheme by the Telangana government to empower Dalit families by providing financial assistance for entrepreneurship and self-employment. The scheme aims to promote economic inclusion and uplift Scheduled Caste (SC) communities through sustainable livelihoods.
key_features: One-time financial assistance for business setup
Promotes economic empowerment of Dalit families

benefits.financial_assistance: Rs. 10 Lakhs per beneficiary for business setup
benefits.market_linkages: Support for market access and business promotion

community_criteria: Must belong to the Scheduled Caste (SC) community
residency_criteria: Must be a resident of Telangana
business_criteria: Proposed business must be viable and sustainable

eligible_activities: Setting up businesses in agriculture, manufacturing, services, or retail
Purchase of equipment, raw materials, or infrastructure

steps: Obtain the application form from the District Collectorâ€™s office or SC Welfare Department
Submit a detailed business plan with the application
Attach required documents, including caste certificate and residency proof
Applications are reviewed by a district-level committee
Approved beneficiaries receive funds and support
application_process.note: Beneficiaries must attend mandatory training sessions

special_notes: The scheme is limited to one beneficiary per Dalit family
Funds are disbursed directly to the beneficiaryâ€™s bank account
Monitoring committees ensure proper utilization of funds
